Pinhole can process most common image types. Either upload your photos individually, or include multiple photos in a zip archive file.

NEW! Photo titles, descriptions, and tags can also be imported via photo meta-data. Most popular photo management tools will embed this information for you. The fields are mapped as follows:

  • title = 'object' or 'headline'
  • description = 'description' or 'caption-abstract'
  • tags = 'city', 'location', 'sub-location', and 'subject' or 'keywords'
This is the time zone of the location this photo/set was taken. Photos time will be displayed using this time zone.
This is the time zone of the camera when it took this photo/set. Often the same as above, unless the camera was set to the wrong time zone.
